ThingDef.label: improved nutrient paste grinder
ThingDef.description: An improved machine that synthesizes edible nutrient paste from organic feedstocks placed in adjacent hoppers. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay. It does not actually dispense the nutrient paste, but it allows it to be pumped into vats and dispensers in the network. It can work with up to 2 inputs of food at the same time.

ThingDef.label: advanced nutrient paste grinder
ThingDef.description: An advanced machine that synthesizes edible nutrient paste from organic feedstocks placed in adjacent hoppers. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay. It does not actually dispense the nutrient paste, but it allows it to be pumped into vats and dispensers in the network. It can work with up to 4 inputs of food at the same time.

ThingDef.label: high tech nutrient paste grinder
ThingDef.description: A high tech machine that synthesizes edible nutrient paste from organic feedstocks placed in adjacent hoppers. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay. It does not actually dispense the nutrient paste, but it allows it to be pumped into vats and dispensers in the network. It can work with up to 8 inputs of food at the same time.

ThingDef.Name: VNPE_NutrientPasteFeedingTube
ThingDef.label: nutrient paste feeding tube
ThingDef.description: An over bed device that feeds a person lying in bed whenever they are hungry, provided that nutrient paste feeding tube is connected to a nutrient paste vat. It must be placed directly on a bed. Placing more than one nutrient paste feeding tube for each person has no effect.

ThingDef.label: diluted nutrient paste feeding tube
ThingDef.description: An over bed device that feeds a person lying in bed whenever they are hungry, provided that nutrient paste feeding tube is connected to a nutrient paste vat. It must be placed directly on a bed. Placing more than one nutrient paste feeding tube for each person has no effect.

ThingDef.label: simple nutrient paste feeding tube
ThingDef.description: An over bed device that feeds a person lying in bed whenever they are hungry, provided that nutrient paste feeding tube is connected to a nutrient paste vat. It must be placed directly on a bed. Placing more than one nutrient paste feeding tube for each person has no effect.

ThingDef.label: fine nutrient paste feeding tube
ThingDef.description: An over bed device that feeds a person lying in bed whenever they are hungry, provided that nutrient paste feeding tube is connected to a nutrient paste vat. It must be placed directly on a bed. Placing more than one nutrient paste feeding tube for each person has no effect.

ThingDef.label: lavish nutrient paste feeding tube
ThingDef.description: An over bed device that feeds a person lying in bed whenever they are hungry, provided that nutrient paste feeding tube is connected to a nutrient paste vat. It must be placed directly on a bed. Placing more than one nutrient paste feeding tube for each person has no effect.

ThingDef.label: nutrient paste compactor
ThingDef.description: A device that compresses and dehydrates nutrient paste into ready-to-eat cubes.

ThingDef.label: nutrient paste packager
ThingDef.description: A device that preserves nutrient paste into ready-to-eat survival packs. Much of the ingredients are wasted in the preservation process.

ThingDef.label: nutrient paste refinery
ThingDef.description: A device that extracting biofuel from nutrient paste. Make a batch of chemfuel as a result.

ThingDef.label: diluted nutrient paste tap
ThingDef.description: A hopper-like storage basin meant to hold dispensed nutrient paste meal from the vats. Can be used by colonists and prisoners. Nutrient paste meal dispensed and ready for pick-up can deteriorate.

ThingDef.label: simple nutrient paste tap
ThingDef.description: A hopper-like storage basin meant to hold dispensed nutrient paste meal from the vats. Can be used by colonists and prisoners. Nutrient paste meal dispensed and ready for pick-up can deteriorate.

ThingDef.label: fine nutrient paste tap
ThingDef.description: A hopper-like storage basin meant to hold dispensed nutrient paste meal from the vats. Can be used by colonists and prisoners. Nutrient paste meal dispensed and ready for pick-up can deteriorate.

ThingDef.label: lavish nutrient paste tap
ThingDef.description: A hopper-like storage basin meant to hold dispensed nutrient paste meal from the vats. Can be used by colonists and prisoners. Nutrient paste meal dispensed and ready for pick-up can deteriorate.

ThingDef.label: diluted nutrient paste dripper
ThingDef.description: A bedside device that feeds a person lying in bed whenever they are hungry, provided that nutrient paste dripper is connected to a nutrient paste vat. It must be placed directly adjacent to and facing the head of the bed. Placing more than one nutrient paste dripper near the same bed has no effect.

ThingDef.label: simple nutrient paste dripper
ThingDef.description: A bedside device that feeds a person lying in bed whenever they are hungry, provided that nutrient paste dripper is connected to a nutrient paste vat. It must be placed directly adjacent to and facing the head of the bed. Placing more than one nutrient paste dripper near the same bed has no effect.

ThingDef.label: fine nutrient paste dripper
ThingDef.description: A bedside device that feeds a person lying in bed whenever they are hungry, provided that nutrient paste dripper is connected to a nutrient paste vat. It must be placed directly adjacent to and facing the head of the bed. Placing more than one nutrient paste dripper near the same bed has no effect.

ThingDef.label: lavish nutrient paste dripper
ThingDef.description: A bedside device that feeds a person lying in bed whenever they are hungry, provided that nutrient paste dripper is connected to a nutrient paste vat. It must be placed directly adjacent to and facing the head of the bed. Placing more than one nutrient paste dripper near the same bed has no effect.

ThingDef.label: diluted nutrient paste feeder
ThingDef.description: A small pipe output that allows colonists and citizens to pick up diluted nutrient paste.

ThingDef.label: simple nutrient paste feeder
ThingDef.description: A small pipe output that allows colonists and citizens to pick up simple nutrient paste.

ThingDef.label: fine nutrient paste feeder
ThingDef.description: A small pipe output that allows colonists and citizens to pick up fine nutrient paste.

ThingDef.label: lavish nutrient paste feeder
ThingDef.description: A small pipe output that allows colonists and citizens to pick up lavish nutrient paste.

ThingDef.label: nutrient paste kibble feeder
ThingDef.description: A small pipe output that allows animals to pick up nutrient paste kibble.

ThingDef.Name: VNPE_HopperShelf
ThingDef.label: hopper shelf
ThingDef.description: This triple-stack shelf is designed to hold resources for machines like nutrient paste dispensers and grinders, with three times the capacity of a standard hopper. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.
